meanings.definition: Levamisoles: a class of drugs used to treat parasitic infections in animals and humans.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian prescribed levamisoles to help the sick dog.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often rely on levamisoles to combat parasitic infections in patients.
meanings.sent3: The zoo animals had a party and joked that the worms were scared of levamisoles.
meanings.sent4: The levamisoles acted like brave knights fighting off the evil parasites in the body.
meanings.sent5: Imagine levamisoles as tiny warriors battling against harmful invaders within the body.
